regen.absent_element: detailed abort procedure for launch and recovery operations
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a clear and automated abort procedure for launch and recovery operations in case of emergency or system failure.

regen.absent_element: abort protocol for launch and recovery operations
regen.new_specification: The system shall implement an abort protocol for automatic launch and recovery operations in case of emergency or system failure.

regen.absent_element: abort protocol in case of interoperability issues with IBLS or CARS
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall have a defined abort protocol for automatic launch and recovery operations in the event of interoperability failures with either the Integrity Beacon Landing System (IBLS) or the Common Automated Recovery System (CARS)

label: The TCS shall initiate abort the launch and recovery procedures if required.
absence: action of aborting the launch and recovery procedures
